Description: Spacious 3BR apartment for rent in South Boston! Great location! Minutes from Public Transportation, Beaches, Castle Island, Restaurants! This unit greets you with hardwood flooring and expands throughout the common living space and bedrooms. An eat in kitchen with granite countertops, stainless steel appliances and dishwasher! Private deck and street parking available. Cats welcomed! No Brokers fee! Available for rent 9/1/23!
